ai-tha-ap354:1.1_0: They’re not frequented by ordinary people,
ai-tha-ap354:1.2_0: I was Then I looked down upon.
ai-tha-ap354:1.3_0: When you see the Awakened One,
ai-tha-ap354:1.4_0: like a fish caught in a funnel-flower.
ai-tha-ap354:2.1_0: compassionate for one, who is compassionate,
ai-tha-ap354:4.1_0: The lie down on the same sheet
ai-tha-ap354:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap354:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap354:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Bhaṇḍagāma.
